nodes.text: Stonias Leem was a being that was a representative of Tendrando Arms on Drewwa who was presented with the Amulet of Kalara by the victors of the Insurrection of Iliabath.
Stonias' species is unknown, it is possible he was a Gran, and if that were the case, he may have been related to Clone Wars era Jedi Master Maks Leem.
